text: Dimaadua ga helekai mai bolo au gi hagailoo ina gi di madawaawa o nia king o Judah ala go di madawaawa David. “Hagalongo, ko Au go Dimaadua deenei ga helekai. Goodou gi hagadina gi humalia, di tonu e hai gi i golo i nia laangi huogodoo. Goodou gi benabena ina nia daangada ala gu halahalau go nia daangada. Maa goodou ga hagalee e hai beenei, di hala dela e hai go goodou gaa hidi iei Au ga hagawelewele ga ulaula gadoo be di ahi dela e deemee di diinai.
